summary.para: Performs a parameterized rectified linear unit (ReLU) activation function on every element in InputTensor, placing the result into the corresponding element of OutputTensor.
summary.code: f(x, slope) = x, if x >= 0 slope * x, otherwise
summary.para: This operator supports in-place execution, meaning that the output tensor is permitted to alias InputTensor during binding.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_PARAMETERIZED_RELU_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: The input tensor to read from.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_PARAMETERIZED_RELU_OPERATOR_DESC.SlopeTensor
member.summary: A tensor containing the slope for each corresponding value of the input.

member.name: DML_ACTIVATION_PARAMETERIZED_RELU_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: The output tensor to write the results to.
